content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals this cheery octopus is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * published in knit 1 skill level easy 1 ball vanna s choice® article #860 or lion® wool article #820 crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter small amount of red yarn fiberfill stuffing some construction required to finish available in different versions 81095ad 1 may 2009 vanna s choice® article #860 *eggplant* 70588ad 2 november 2007 lion® wool article #820 *purple* *lion brand yarns requires free registration to access patterns * also available on michaels com lion brand crochet amigurumi octopus 3 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/81095ad html 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/70588ad html 3 https //web archive org/web/20121019021142/http //www michaels com/lion-brand-crochet-amigurumi-octopus/e07022 default pd html
